name: The Red Dot Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Jerry find Elaine's watch?
questions.explanation:
Under a sofa cushion.

	He decides to go to the Christmas party at Elaine's work to give it to her.  They end up staying for a while.

questions.text: What is the name of Elaine's boyfriend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Dick.

	Dick stopped drinking and Jerry accidentally gets him drinking again at the Christmas party.  He accidentally gets Elaine's drink mixed up with Dick's non-alcoholic drink.

questions.text: What is the name of the book that George pretends to have read when he meets Elaine's boss?
questions.explanation:
Venetian Blinds.

	He states that "Venetian Blinds" was written by Art Vandelay.  Art Vandelay will become one of the many names that the group uses through the series.

questions.text: What kind of sweater does George buy as a gift for Elaine?
questions.explanation:
Cashmere.

	George buys the sweater because it was marked down to a low eighty-five dollars because it had a red dot on it.  He gets it because Elaine got George the job at Pendant Publishing.

questions.text: What kind of drink does Jerry make Kramer drink so that he and Elaine could see if he smelled?
questions.explanation:
Scotch.

	Jerry states that you can smell alcohol on someone after just one drink because Elaine suspects that Dick may be drinking again.

questions.text: What is the name of the alcoholic drink that Kramer, George, and Jerry all drink in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Hennigan's.

	Hennigan's is another fictional name.  George ends up drinking it before sleeping with the cleaning lady at Pendant Publishing.

questions.text: Where is the cleaning lady from?
questions.explanation:
Panama.

	When she was young, she saw cashmere for the first time and she was unfortunately unable to have any, but George gives her some.

questions.text: Who does George give the sweater to after Elaine gives it back?
questions.explanation:
The cleaning lady.

	Since he can't return it, he gives it to the cleaning lady, but she realizes that the shirt has the red dot on it.

questions.text: Where do Jerry, George, and Elaine hide when Elaine's boyfriend tries to find them?
questions.explanation:
Under a desk.

	George tries to make Dick go away by giving him the cashmere, but he also noticed the red dot on it.  George was fired from his job for sleeping with the cleaning lady.

questions.text: What is the cleaning woman's name?
questions.explanation:
It isn't given.

	The name is never given in the episode, but on the "Seinfeld" DVD set, it is told that the woman's name is Evie.
